constituent: radiance, ray, small, little, human legs, army, chariot, crown, vehicle, car
heisigStory: Take advantage of the first syllable of the key word to think of the ray of light to the left. Now add the glittering chariot that is emitting those rays and you have radiance.
koohiiStory1: Rays of light emitted from Apollo´s chariot = radiance. Don´t put the sun into this kanji. The rays are coming from the chariot directly!
koohiiStory2: Radiance is an army of rays.
myStory: sóng radian. tia quân đội dùng là sóng radian
